At Capital One, were building a leading information-based technology company. Together, we are on a quest to change banking for good.

Senior Data Engineer

We are looking for intellectually curious and driven individuals to join our team of talented data engineers and create cutting-edge Big Data solutions for Capital Ones Cloud and on-premises data platforms.

On any given day you will:

·Develop Big Data applications using technologies such as Java, Scala,Hadoop, Spark, MapReduce, REST API, Hive, AWS, S3, Postgres

·Develop solutions to enable auditing and data usage monitoring in our Cloud platforms.

·Work directly with Product Owners and end- develop solutions in a hi highly collaborative and agile environment.

·Help grow and mentor team members on the fine art of data engineering and software abstractions

·Passion for learning, growing, and mentoring in a team environment

What we have:

· Flexible work schedules

· Generous salary and merit-based pay incentives

· A startup mindset with the wallet of a top 10 bank

· Monthly innovation challenges dedicated to test driving cutting edge technologies

· Your choice of equipment (MacBook/PC, iPhone/Android Device)

Basic Qualifications

·Bachelor's Degree or Military experience

·At least 3 years of experience in Java or Scala

·At least 3 years of experience with Unix/Linux systems with scripting experience in Shell or Python

Preferred Qualifications

·Masters Degree

·2+ years of experience delivering analytical data warehouse solutions or fit

for purpose data stores

·3+ years of experience building data pipelines and fit for purpose

·data stores

·1+ years of experience working with Spark, Hadoop, AWS, SQL, Database

·design and Modeling

·1 + years of experience working with automated build and continuous

·integration systems
